column2: `` charles thomson samuel hardy dear sir philada july 2. 1785 i.e 1784 sent account longchamps trial better mr wilson mr attorney general 1 gone meet committee. think proper send minute detail matter ministers paris prevent disagreeable consequences. purpose requested mr attorney general careful preserving correspondence passed mr marbois subject well notes relative thereto. returns call upon draw july 2 1784 short account shall honor submitting inspection. slight touch disorder usually attacks season year. left weak hope shall soon recover. please make respects comee. great esteem respect sr obt h ser ct p.s. send first 3 numbers herald 2 paper made appearance city ``

`` pierse long meshech weare sir new york jany. 1st. 1785. honor inform excelly. arriving trenton day congress adjourned city meet 11th instant -- inclosed paper see resolves purpose. 1 next vessel bound place portsmouth expect transmit journals congress far may prepared time. interim sentiments esteem respect excelly obedt. huml. servt. pierse long p.s. expect mr foster days princeton -- left two days ago ``

`` samuel william johnson dear billy new york jany. 16th. 1785 hardly know say answer yrs. 14th. one hand health last importance -- indeed everything. therefore good prospect recovering without voyage probability service respect room hesitate sho 'd means go. hand great loss business extreme embarrassment affairs leave situation necessity absent yet greater importance sho 'd loose fine opportunity initiating business. opportunity may easily retrived. yet nothing health requires. things turned respect yr. sisters health lament exceedingly accepted appointment attend congress far engaged retreat must e'en best embarrass 'd situation. opinion therefore present making preparation voyage may fail opportunity presents going necessary find favorable alteration health god grant may omit. mode propose providing right one get horses cattle c debtors best apply immediately see january 16 1785 engage. highest opinion benjamin perhaps good merits. therefore vessell good captain clever sho 'd prefer. make full enquiries upon subject much every respect depends upon captain. woosters board would help much secure good treatment well company. write particularly stage posts point health also opportunity advise dr. bard upon subject may able give decisive judgment respect. 1 advise also please dr. nicoll judgment feelings must deside god grant may determine right best every respect. happy nancy comfortable. heaven grant may continue. tenderest love remain yr. affectionate father friend wm saml. johnson ``

`` richard henry lee george washington dear sir new york jany. 16. 1785 honor writing last post left trenton quitted place 1 soon troubled furnish excellent pamphlet accompanies letter. 2 doctor price lately sent pamphlets president congress left disposal. sure shall gratify doctors feelings well request acceptance one. 3 news except account brought packet england arrived current town -- war emperor holland certainly commenced. small engagement near li1le upon scheldt taken place dutch regiment said lost 20 30 men. prussia said taken part holland empress russia emperor. probable quarrel proceeds embroil greatest part europe. hope great britain find compelled engage. best respects attend lady. dear sir truest esteem regard sincerely richard henry lee ``
